governance_declaration.description: This file records the full trace of ensemble aggregation for audit and reproducibility purposes.
governance_declaration.non_decisional_notice: This trace does not represent a valuation decision, approval, or market value.
governance_declaration.human_accountability: Final responsibility for valuation conclusions remains with licensed human appraisers.

outlier_suppression.governance_note: Outlier suppression, if applied, does not modify original model outputs.

weight_assignment.governance_note: Weights are pre-approved, non-adaptive, and not optimized by outcome.

price_aggregation.governance_note: Aggregated price is indicative only and not a valuation decision.

confidence_estimation.governance_note: Confidence reflects agreement and data quality only; it does not measure accuracy or approve valuation.

audit_footer.immutable_notice: This file must not be overwritten once persisted.
audit_footer.retention_policy: Per bank and regulatory data retention rules
